turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi how can I help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I 'd like to make an order for Bella Luna's, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure thing, how many pizzas did you need?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need two large pizzas, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay and what toppings did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I have one that's a meat lover's pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: and one that is green pepper, onion, pork sausage, and cheese, please.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And I have one pizza that's meat lovers.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And the other pizza I need green pepper, onion, and pork sausage, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 2 large pizzas, one meetlovers, and one green pepper, onion, and pork sausage, right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: May I also have gluten-free crust for both of those?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing, after adding the gluten free crust it's going to be 45 89.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay you'll get your reciept via text and your pizza will be done in 30 min.
